channel.title: Habitat Mapping on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS
channel.description: Recent content in Habitat Mapping on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS

item.title: QField for Land Restoration and Conservation
item.description:
Workflows

  • Restoration site mapping and monitoring
  • Habitat assessments and invasive species tracking
  • Community programs and stewardship records

Integrated with QGIS and QFieldCloud

Design forms and symbology in QGIS, then sync and review via QFieldCloud.

item.title: QField for Wildlife Tracking and Habitat Mapping
item.description:
Workflows

  • Wildlife observations and telemetry
  • Habitat mapping and suitability assessments
  • Protected areas surveys and monitoring

Integrated with QGIS and QFieldCloud

Prepare symbology and forms in QGIS, then sync projects with QFieldCloud to collaborate across teams.
